trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract methods and events that are required to implement a plug-in document output serializer.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi astratti e gli eventi necessari per implementare un serializzatore di output di documenti plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Instances of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> should be created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> object, not the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> method of an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>deve essere creato tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>metodo di un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>dell'oggetto, non il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>metodo di un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, Annulla un'operazione di scrittura asincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"></xref> that writes collated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"> </xref> che scrive elementi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elementi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"></xref> that writes collated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements to the document output serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"> </xref> che scrive elementi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> il documento di output della serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"></xref> that writes collated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements together with the given print tickets.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"> </xref> che scrive elementi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> insieme ai ticket di stampa specificati.

trans-unit.source: `documentSequencePT` or `documentPT` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `documentSequencePT`o `documentPT` può essere `null` se non sono presenti impostazioni di stampate preferite.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the given print tickets for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica il ticket di stampa specificati per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specifico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>valido per una determinata stampante.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito preferenze di stampa per <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito preferenze di stampa per <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"></xref> that writes collated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements to the document output serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"> </xref> che scrive elementi <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> il documento di output della serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes the content of a given <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono il contenuto di un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output <xref:System.IO.Stream> of the write operation is normally specified as a parameter to the constructor of the derived class that implements <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.
trans-unit.target: L'output <xref:System.IO.Stream>della scrittura operazione viene in genere specificata come parametro al costruttore della classe derivata che implementa <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The document paginator that defines the content to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Impaginatore di documenti che definisce il contenuto da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when a write operation finishes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs just before a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> is added to a stream by a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write*> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, si verifica subito prima un <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> viene aggiunto a un flusso da un <> </> *> o <> </> *> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The WritingPrintTicketRequired event enables the event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: L'evento WritingPrintTicketRequired consente al gestore eventi sostituire un nuovo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>a quello specificato nella <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>chiamata al metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> updates its progress.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> Aggiorna lo stato di avanzamento.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> could update its progress after every page or after every document in a multi-document write operation.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>dopo ogni pagina o documento in un multi-documento di operazione di scrittura è stato possibile aggiornare lo stato di avanzamento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
